About Me

iOS Developer

Bio

A creative software engineer with a passion for Swift and Xcode. I am currently seeking junior iOS development roles.

Iâ€™m passionate about iOS development. I believe in making things that matter to people. The iPhone changed the way the world worked. The combination of its power and mobility made phones a viable extension of our minds. A device that we could reliably offload cognitive burdens, so that we could focus on things that mattered to us more. So I see myself as an engineer working on my small corner of a grand project to reshape the way we interact with the world. Nothing in this world makes me happier than solving complex problems with code. I love iOS. I love Swift as a language. And most of all I love the greater community around both iOS Development and Swift as a language. People like Paul Hudson, Sean Allen, John Sundell, Brian Voong, and countless others have made the iOS community one of the most inviting and accessible communities in tech.
